comment: Variation of Axiom of Infinity. There exists a nonempty set that is a subset of its union (using ~ zfinf as a hypothesis). Abbreviated version of the Axiom of Infinity in [FreydScedrov] p. 283. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1996.)
